title: PC 28 March - Palestine: heavy raids on Rafah and on the hospitals of Khan Youunis and Gaza City. Also died in the West Bank .....
content:
..... and Meloni goes to Lebanon to strengthen the support for the nazi/Zionist Genocida

D'N D'NURT

Palestine.

Violent Israelis raids hit today, Wednesday 27 March, in particularRafah, with Air and artillery bombing. At dawn targeted an area close to the Egyptian border where they were piled up, in Fortune curtains, thousands of displaced people: 11 the dead. Between themyet another journalist, Ola Abdelmoneim Lubbad,killed together with her husband and children in an Israeli air attack who targeted the house where he had sought refuge, together with About one million Palestinians. Israelis Raid repeatedly also in the rest of the strip, with the health facilities always in viewfinder. Atospedale Nasser, a Khan Yunis, arrests of medical staff and among the displaced people. The neighboring neighborhoods are bombed states. Dozens of civilians killed. Alsothe other Amal Medical Center, the Palestinian Red Crescent, also in Khan Yunis, he suffered

the same fate and it is out of order. It then continues, for now9 days, the siege of the hospital Alla-shifa of Gaza City. Here, denounces the independent NGO Euromed Monitor,The occupant army has shot at least 13 children.

From 7 October,Tel Aviv killed 32,490 Mila Palestinians(almost 15 thousand minors) and wounded 75 of it thousands. Then there are at least 10 thousand missing, under the rubble: reduced At a minimum, the chances of finding someone in life. In the latest 24 hours there are 60 air raids, with 8 massacres, 76 victims and 102 wounded. As announced by several representatives of the government, Tel Aviv therefore does not haveno intention to respect the resolutionof the UN Security Council meeting three days ago. Indeed: The occupation is hitting harder and harder, both in Gaza and in theOccupied West Bank.Here are 3 Palestinians killedJenin, Mentre a nablus of qalqiliawounded Seriously two young people of 20 and 21 years old. In all these operations, Israeli troops are accompanied by military bulldozers for the destruction of urban infrastructures. Raid then continues e kidnappings, disguised as arrests: according to theSociety Palestinian Prisoners,Since 7 October, there have been 7,800 Palestinians taken away by the occupiers.

The update of the situation in Palestine, 173 days after the beginning of the Israeli genocide, with Francesco Giordano, partner in front Palestine.Listen or download

Lebanon - On the north front, the premierMelonsIt is today - Wednesday 27 March - in Beirut, while aerial raid Israelis hit the Bekaa valley, east ofLebanon, over a hundred kilometers from the demarcation line. Hezbollah announced the killing of three militants. Hit then From the Israeli raids a first aid center to Hbariye: 7 the victims killed. Hezbollah, in response, launched 50 rockets on Military stations and Israeli settlements: a dead man in Kiriyat Shmon.

From Beirut there Correspondence by Pasquale Porciello, freelance journalist and ours collaborator.Listen or download
